title: Cookie Policy
description: Information about cookie usage on PipetkaOnline

what.title: What are Cookies
what.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They help the site remember your preferences and improve functionality.

how.title: How We Use Cookies
how.content: We use cookies to ensure website functionality, analyze usage, and display relevant advertising.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.content: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be disabled. They provide basic functionality and security.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.content: We use Google Analytics to understand how visitors use our site. This data helps us improve the website.

advertising.title: Advertising Cookies
advertising.content: We use cookies to display relevant advertising through Google AdSense and Yandex.Direct. These cookies track your interests to personalize ads.

manage.title: Managing Cookies
manage.content: You can manage cookies through your browser settings. Note that disabling some cookies may affect website functionality.
